elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.  When my Expedition moves forward — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.  When you roll one or more dice — You may pay {1}. If you do: I gain 1 boost.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may discard target Permanent.  When you roll one or more dice — You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: I gain 2 boosts.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.  When I leave the Expedition zone — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.  When another Character you control gains [[Fleeting]] — []Target Character gains 1 boost.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.  When another Character you control gains [[Fleeting]] — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: Target Character gains 1 boost.
When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — [][Sabotage].  At Dusk — If I have 1 or more boosts: You may discard target Permanent.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.  When my Expedition moves forward — You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: You may have target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less other than me gain [[Anchored]].

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  When my Expedition moves forward — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Permanent.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Character in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  When my Expedition moves forward — If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Draw a card.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.  At Dusk — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.

When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Exchange target Card in your Reserve with a card from your hand.  When my Expedition moves forward — If I have 1 or more boosts: You may discard target Permanent.
{H} If I'm the only Character in my Expedition: You may have target Character gain [[Asleep]].  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Draw a card.

When my Expedition moves forward — You may have me gain [[Fleeting]]. If you do: Draw a card.  When my Expedition moves forward — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may return a card other than me from your Reserve to your hand.
